body.name: 4K Dash Cam Front, GOODTS Car Camera 2160P with WiFi, Dash Camera for Cars with Dedicated Car Charger, Dashcam with App Control,G-Sensor,Parking Monitor,Loop Recording,3M Bracket,Free 64GB SD Card
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 1 hr 5 mins
FREE delivery Friday, February 23 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: 【4K ULTRA HD 2160P FRONT DASH CAM】The dash camera adopts advanced 4K resolution up to 3840*2160P@30fps, F1.6 aperture and 6 glass lenses, which can automatically balance the color and brightness of the picture to record super clear video. 4K UHD can help you clearly record key details. Note: Please connect the car charger and car ignition to use it. When the car is turned off, the dashcam will be turned off and the wifi will be automatically disconnected!

【 WIFI CONNECTION & APP CONTROL】This car camera comes with the app for Android or iOS smartphones, you can connect the A15 dashcam to Viidure APP via built-in WiFi to manage and change camera settings, and live preview, download videos, change settings, edit and share your footage. Share the video to YouTube, Twitter, Facebook or other social media through this app, allowing you to share any journey with all your friends. Note: This dashcam must connect wifi to Viidure App to operate!

【G-SENSOR & LOOP RECORDING】The car dash cam is equipped with a G-sensor function to automatically monitor the surrounding environment. When the collision reaches the condition of triggering the G-sensor, this car camera will lock the current video and save it from being overwritten. The loop recording function of the car camera will continuously record video clips of 1/3/5 minutes, when the memory card is full, it will overwrite the unlocked video to continue recording.

【TWO PARKING MONITOR MODES】This dashcam has two parking monitor modes. When a collision to the car is detected, the collision parking monitoring mode will be triggered, and a 30s video will be recorded and locked. Time-lapse recording mode will record at 2fps per second, will not take up too much space on the Memory card, and supports 24 /48/96 hours safe parking. The Hardwire Kit(not included) must be connected to trigger the parking monitor modes, please search and purchase for B0BTZQC2VW.

【ADVANCED WDR & 150°WIDE-ANGLE】This dashcam is equipped with advanced WDR technology, the camera mounted on the car dashboard can automatically balance the under-exposure and over-exposure video, capture important details, and output high-quality video. The car camera is equipped with a 150° wide-angle lens to help eliminate blind spots and capture more video details, providing sufficient evidence to keep you away from car accident disputes.
body.description: GOODTS - GOOD PRODUCTS, GOOD LIFE! GOODTS is committed to providing you with high-quality and cost-effective good products from powerful suppliers. GODDTS is committed to providing 4K UHD & APP-controlled dash cam with WiFi, make every car has a high-quality dashcam with app. If you are looking for a high-resolution dash cam, A15 will be your best choice. GOODTS 4K Dash Cameras with WIFi Warm Tips This dashcam has no built-in battery and must be connected to a car charger. This dashcam must connect wifi to Viidure App to operate. The prefix ofthe WiFiname is GOODTS XXXX, and the default password is 12345678. Two ways to playback the recorded video: (1) Playback the video through the viidure app. (2)Use the Memory Card Reader to connect the Memory Card and the computer to playback the video. Please read the manual carefully before using this dashcam. If you have any questions while using it, please get in touch with us, and we will reply within 24 hours to help you solve the problem.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Due to the unique design of this 4K dashcam, we provide you with a dedicated car charger, and there are no other compatible car chargers available on the market. We strongly recommend that you do not use other car chargers or power cords, as this may cause the dashcam to malfunction and damage during acceleration. What's In the box? A15 Front Dash Camera（No Rear and Inside Camera） Car Charger 3M Bracket Car windshield sticker 64GB Memory Card (in the dashcam) Crowbar Cable Clamp Use Manual GOODTS - GOOD PRODUCTS, GOOD LIFE! GOODTS is committed to providing you with high-quality and cost-effective good products from powerful suppliers. GODDTS is committed to providing 4K UHD & APP-controlled dash cam with WiFi, make every car has a high-quality dashcam with app. If you are looking for a high-resolution dash cam, A15 will be your best choice. GOODTS 4K Dash Cameras with WIFi Warm Tips This dashcam has no built-in battery and must be connected to a car charger. This dashcam must connect wifi to Viidure App to operate. The prefix ofthe WiFiname is GOODTS XXXX, and the default password is 12345678. Two ways to playback the recorded video: (1) Playback the video through the viidure app. (2)Use the Memory Card Reader to connect the Memory Card and the computer to playback the video. Please read the manual carefully before using this dashcam. If you have any questions while using it, please get in touch with us, and we will reply within 24 hours to help you solve the problem.

EASY INSTALLTON FOR CAR Fit the dash cam and the 3M bracket together, attach the car cam to the windshield, connect the type c interface and the car ignition port with a car charger, and then use the crowbar and cable clamp to hide the charger cable in the gap of the windshield and the storage box. ADVANCED WDR TECHNOLOGY The WDR function of the camera for car can balance over-exposure or under-exposure to provide clearer images and more video recording details, allowing you to get the most stable images and important car accident evidence. EASY VIDEO PLAYBACK This front car camera is very easy to view and playback videos, you can connect the viidure app to playback and download videos through your phone, or use the Memory card reader to connect the front dash cam to a computer to view and download videos.

DETACHABLE & LENS ROTATABLE The 3M Bracket is detachable and easy to install. The 4K front camera can be rotated 45 degrees, and can be adjusted to a suitable position according to the environment in the car, clearly displaying license plates or road signs in the distance. EASY TO REMOVE & NO TRACE This car camera dash cam provides windshield stickers. Can be easily applied, peeled off and on car windshield decals with no adhesive residue, no solvents or scratches to remove decals to prevent damage to the glass. UP TO 128GB Memory CARD The 4K dash camera must use a genuine memory card. Otherwise, this dash cam will not record. Max Support 128 GB memory card (64GB memory card is included in the package)

GOODTS 4K DASH CAM WITH WIFI FQA Q: Will this 4K dash cam with wifi still work if the car is turned off? A: Since the dash cam and the car ignition are connected through a car charger, once the car is turned off, the dash cam will shut down immediately and cannot continue to work. Q: Why does this 4K dash cam with wifi suddenly switch on and off when the car engine is turned off and the doors are opened/closed? A:This is because you have park mode on. When the car is closed and parked, the vibration of opening/closing the door is recognized as a car crash. This will automatically turn on and record an emergency video before turning off. If you really don't like this, we recommend turning off Parking Mode. However, be aware that if Parking Mode is turned off, it will not activate automatically to preserve important evidence should your car be hit while parked.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent dash cam solution that records video but needs better install options
reviews.reviewText: I bought this because I wanted to get a dash mount camera for recording video when I drive. I drive a lot for my job and I think it’s good to record what’s happening on the road in case something happens.This was fairly inexpensive and had features I was looking for. First I will say that it takes pretty good video. It’s not as good as some of the very expensive high end dash cam systems but it’s more than good enough for what I need. I like that it records to an SD card so I can move the video to my laptop or other external storage. The system even comes with one but I purchased a much larger 2TB one.The picture is bright and easy to see but you have to really be careful how you mount the camera. Take your time and do lots of testing with placement so you do not end up with video of the sky or your vehicle hood.It comes with double sided tape to mount the camera. This is good to make the camera easy to remove. It’s definitely not a permanent mount option. If you want to permanent mount the camera, you will need some silicone adhesive.The app is pretty straight forward and allows you to review the video during and after it is taken. I worry about the privacy of the app data being that it is a foreign company. I don’t put anything personal on the app if I can help it.The camera could be a little smaller but it’s not too bad. It doesn’t block the windshield as long as you mount it high enough. I do wish it was a smaller foot print but I understand that it contains both the camera and the recorder.My big issue is the long cable that needs to run from the camera to a power source. The kit comes with these little stick in clips to run the cable but they are garbage. They don’t stick very well to the glass and/or dashboard and they break very easily. There has got to be a better way to run the cable or make it rechargeable with a built in battery.The install was frustrating and I actually went and purchased my own 3M mounting tabs and clips. I had to get creative and run it under my dashboard so it was hidden and I wouldn’t kick it by accident.Overall it’s not a bad solution. But I think they should rethink the install process. Put more thought into the install process. Use a rechargeable battery for example.I’m taking a star off because of the installation. Four stars from me on this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Feels a little cheap but it does the job well!
reviews.reviewText: The camera records in 5-min blocks of time starting at the top of every hour. When memory fills up, the oldest videos are deleted to make room for the new ones.If something happens in front of you that you want to retain, you simply press the "lock" button on the camera. This will save it forever so that you can (connect with your phone and) review it later. The "trick" with this is that it will only lock the 5 minute video block that you are in. So if the incident happened at 4:44:30 and you hit the lock at 4:45, you'll lock in the 4:45-4:50 block. This means you should go back and review your locked videos as quickly as possible to make sure you have the correct one saved.To access the camera you connect to its wireless access point with your phone and their dedicated app.I noted that when the camera is set to record at the best quality, it does take a while to copy video to my phone.As far as picture quality: It's pretty good but like most inexpensive dash cams, it isn't quite good enough to get a CLEAR picture of license plates. That said, I WAS able to get partial plate numbers in a couple of situations. This combined with the obvious color, make, and model of a vehicle provide all that is needed to positively identify it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Ehh it's okay.. .
reviews.reviewText: It works.. does what it should. But there are many other options that seem to do it better. User interface wasn't the most pleasant and the image quality could definitely be better. It will work for sticky situations and would be kay for someone getting their first cam without wanting to break the bank.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Extremely limited mounting and power cable options.
reviews.reviewText: If you're looking for a dash cam that can capture every detail of your high-speed adventures, the GoodTS 4K Dash Cam might be what you need. This sleek and shiny device delivers what it promises to deliver: 4K ultra-high-definition resolution up to 3840*2160P@30fps, F1.6 aperture and 6 glass lenses, and a nitrous oxide booster that lets you accelerate your video recording with the push of a button. Well, I feel that, like my nitrous oxide booster button claim, those specs were also exaggerated.The GoodTS 4K Dash Cam Front is not just a camera; it's a companion. You can connect it to your smartphone via built-in WiFi and control it with the Viidure app. You can live preview, download, and share your footage with your friends or the world. There were supposed to be voice prompts guiding you through the settings and functions, but I never heard anything.The GoodTS 4K Dash Cam Front also has some smart features that protect you and your car. It has a G-sensor function that automatically locks the current video in case of a collision or a sudden braking event. It also has two parking monitor modes that record what happens when you're away from your car. You can choose between collision parking monitoring mode or time-lapse recording mode which supports 24/48/96 hours safe parking. These sound like cool features, but I didn't try any of that stuff because I'm not interested in using it.The videos play well on my phone, both in the app and after being downloaded. However, when transferred to my PC, I couldn't get VLC to play them without stuttering. After re-encoding using VidCoder, they play fine using VLC. I'm not sure what is going on here.The camera should have some better options for mounting. I drive company cars, and since it's rarely the same vehicle, I can't leave anything in it when I'm done. My last dash cam could be easily clipped to the sunvisor, but this cam has nothing of the sort. It just has its own non-standard window mounting bracket.The cam has a USB-C input for power, but I couldn't get it to work with any power cord other than the provided cigarette lighter cord. I've tried a variety of USB-C cords, chargers, and power sources. NOTHING worked but the provided cord. Some of my work cars even have a USB-C power output port on the dash, but I can't make use of them. With this camera, it's the cigarette lighter cord or nothing.I deducted one star for the power cable limitation and one for the lack of mounting options. The best parts of this camera are the well-designed Viidure app and the video quality itself. It's very sharp and crisp.The GoodTS 4K Dash Cam Front is a great dash cam for anyone who loves speed, thrills, and adrenaline. It's like having your own personal Fast and Furious movie every time you hit the road. Just don't forget to buckle up and drive safely.
